title: Tech Bytes: Better cybersecurity is the need of the hour - The Financial Express
content: Tech Bytes: Better cybersecurity is the need of the hour  The Financial Express
description: “The survey shows that organisations in India are at significant risk of a cyberattack, including ransomware, which can have a far-reaching impact on customers, reputation and operations,” said Sunil Sharma, MD – sales, Sophos India and Saarc.
